sections.future_talents_description: Helping young refugees and financially disadvantaged youth access IT apprenticeships in Switzerland. Through a 5-day training, participants develop soft skills and explore IT career paths.

sections.women_connect_description: Interactive workshop series aiming to create a safe space and fostering a supportive environment to spark a fire amongst women from refugee or migrant backgrounds to develop their interest in IT by learning from women in tech.
sections.female_impact_description: Felt better equipped to build their own IT careers

sections.bootcamp_description: 3-month full-time training followed by a 6-12-month internship offered twice a year to help participants from refugee and migrant backgrounds enter the IT workforce by developing IT specialisations and soft skills.
